Entries.movieTheater: Oh, heya @. Have you heard? We've got a new movie theater.#$b#I used to love going to the movies when I was a kid...$s
Entries.spring_23{{YearRemainder}}: Between you and I, @, I really don't want to go to the flower dance tomorrow.$s

Entries.summer_Shane: Ugh, I'm no fan of the summer heat. And no, sparkling water is NOT the same.$s#$b#Maybe I'll go get some ice to put on my neck...$s

Entries.1{{YearRemainder}}: Gosh, I don't have any energy today. Maybe I should go grab a pizza from Gus's?$s
